game_description: Join the excitement in BeatsPunch, where you can test your reflexes, coordination, and precision by punching your way through exhilarating music tracks. The game automatically detects and syncs with any MP3 songs in your Oculus Quest's "Downloads" or "Music" folders, creating a dynamic, personalized experience. With the new multiplayer beta, invite your friends to join the fun and Compete with up to 4 of them in real-time. Share your favorite songs and challenge each other to beat the highest scores. Unleash your competitive spirit and see who can master the rhythm. Experience the visually stunning environment of BeatsPunch, specifically designed to immerse you in a world of pulsating beats and fast-paced action. Stay engaged with the game's satisfying haptic feedback and intuitive controls, allowing you to feel every punch and swipe. Don't miss the opportunity to dive into this rhythm-packed adventure, and share the experience with your friends in the multiplayer beta. Download BeatsPunch now and become the ultimate music warrior with your own unique song library!
Languages: English, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)
review_1: It will not let me play more than one song. It keeps saying to set my weight, but the number pad does not work to enter my weight. How do I fix this?
review_2: New game similar to the other rhyming fitness apps but different exciting music and being able to play while listening to your music of choice is a huge bonus.
review_3: I bought this today after seeing the brilliant reviews but so far I can’t see what the hype is as after I play one game on easy mode I can’t play a game straight after as it doesn’t reload I’ve got to quit the game 2-3 times until I can play again. I will give a review in about a weeks time hopefully it’ll be a better one. Can anyone tell me why I can’t play a game straight after playing again without quitting the game to open the game again to play? It’s says you can keep a record of your calories on an app on android. Does anyone know what the app is & where available Thanks Liz
review_4: As the title says, you can have a nice chunk of time working out with this app because of it’s feature that you can add any music track and automatically makes you the map and it’s beats. I really enjoy it and will be expending more time on it!
review_5: Great for fun or exercise. Wonderful graphics. Different backgrounds. Custom music. I liked playing each if the 5 levels from easy which was slower up to god mode which went much quicker. Bonus, it keeps track of calories burned!
